column1: I have been using this Olay cleanser for awhile now. I like the fact that it is a mild scrub and never leaves my skin feeling dry. The fragrance is subtle but very pleasant.

This facial cleanser is fabulous. I use others cleansers but they don't come close to Olay scrubs cleanser. I wouldn't use anymore cleanser. I am done. I'm going to stick with Olay. My face feels smooth and looks clean and vibrant. Also remove dark spots. I really do love it!
